description: Partnering with global design studios to implement high-end web experiences. Specializing in SvelteKit, WebGL, and interaction design to bridge the gap between design and engineering.
Led the frontend team for award-winning e-commerce projects. Focused on performance optimization, accessibility, and implementing headless CMS architectures for scalable content management.
Built scalable backend systems and responsive UIs for SaaS products. Collaborated closely with product managers to deliver features that increased user retention by 25%.
